definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Nitroglycerine is discharged from the bottom of the tank and passes to the filters.
sentences.chinese: 硝化甘油可自槽底放出进入过滤器。

sentences.english: Nitroglycerine is disharged from the bottom of the tank and passes to the filters.
sentences.chinese: 硝化甘油可自槽底放出进入过滤器。

sentences.english: Nitroglycerine is hardly miscible with water .
sentences.chinese: 硝化甘油几乎不与水混溶。

sentences.english: Feliks gently lifted the bottle of nitroglycerine out of the sink.
sentences.chinese: 费利克斯轻轻地从水池中拿起那瓶硝化甘油。

sentences.english: Anybody see her put nitroglycerine into his wine?
sentences.chinese: 有人看见她把硝化甘油倒进他的酒里了吗？

sentences.english: The main components of the solid propellant are nitrocellulose and nitroglycerin.
sentences.chinese: 固体推进剂的主要成分为硝化棉和硝化甘油。

sentences.english: Mathematical model about injection nitrator producing nitroglycerine is founded and several assumptions are put forth in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对喷射硝化器生产硝化甘油进行了模拟计算。

sentences.english: I groped in my shirt pocket and pulled out the nitro tablets.
sentences.chinese: 我在衬衣口袋里摸索，摸出了硝化甘油药片。

sentences.english: Nitroglycerin dilates blood vessels and increases blood flow to the tendons.
sentences.chinese: 硝化甘油使血管膨胀增加了向腱子部位流动的血流量。

sentences.english: Nitroglycerine is hardly miscible with water.
sentences.chinese: 硝化甘油几乎不与水混溶。

sentences.english: I breathe with my mouth open and say, nitroglycerin.
sentences.chinese: 我张大了嘴，猛吸了口气说，硝化甘油。
